basic_info.description: I'm Matt Rangel. Former project manager for a large electrical construction company, and now a Software Developer. I have worked my way from being a laborer to a project manager in a decades time. In each role, I have been entrusted to guide teams and have worked successfully alongside some excellent people. I’m looking for that same environment within the tech field, so I can learn new skills and collaborate in solving problems. Software Development reminds me when I started in the construction field, where I knew nothing. I had to lean heavily on my peers and the more I learned, the more I realize I didn’t know. So I keep an open mind, keeping driving and learning new concepts that excite me and find ways on how I can apply my new found skill to solve real world problems. I realize I’m cracking my creative side open and see whole new set of possibilities. I would love to be more involved in helping solve the worlds problems, through the power of coding!

projects.title: Local Gym Website
projects.description: Local gym website to showcase equipment and serve as the landing page for gym's online presence

projects.title: Movie Rater
projects.description: A web app that has a login and enables the user to create, read, update, and delete movies as well as rank them based on a star scale. (*WIP* Heroku made some changes that requires changes in my code.)

projects.title: CodeFellows Survey
projects.description: Took existing survey application and added additional functionality, storing data in user subdomains. Each subdomain will have the ability to organize, take notes and delete survey data from their organization.

projects.title: Animal Racer
projects.description: A trivia race project to showcase creativity and construct a trivial website that gives our users the ability to test their animal knowledge while experiencing the excitement of a real-time race.

projects.title: Bus Mall Products
projects.description: Project assignment that I learned how to toggle pictures and render a graph based out of how many likes each picture got.
